hrishi: CIS har saal Food Fest organize karti hai
Har saal naya naya kuch to rehta. Iss saal masst kuch to hona chahiye re!
Baaki Samiksha ko puchhlo vo CIS mein thi pehle se
samiksha: CIS ka yearly event hai Food Fest
Issme bahut alag alag dishes banate hain juniors
Hum token kharidke kha sakte hain
Jis team ne sabse zyada becha unhe koi prize milta hai
Baaki Hrishi se puchh lo vo bhi CIS mein tha pehle se
